headline.main: Trump to Host Germany's Merkel at the White House
headline.print_headline: Trump to Host Germany's Merkel at the White House

lead_paragraph: Two tools that the Federal Reserve heavily relies upon to predict U.S. inflation in fact provide little practical help, and the Fed would be wise to only modestly overshoot its 2-percent price target, concludes a high-profile paper published on Friday.
